name: ExtraHeavyDutyHospitalBedSupply
title: Extra Heavy Duty Hospital Bed Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Hospital bed durable medical equipment for patients over 600 pounds.),(Data Element Scope: Durable medical equipment - hospital beds supporting patients weighing over 600 pounds, as defined by US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment for patients over 600 pounds.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment for patients weighing 350 pounds, up to and including 600 pounds.)
